item.name: FRHD-196

body.raw:
{
  "input" :
  {
     "ios-cli:command" : "conf t
as-path-set 2
  ios-regex '^$'
end-set
!
as-path-set 11
  ios-regex '^(2914_)+$'
end-set
!
as-path-set 12
  ios-regex '_27699$',
  ios-regex '_9506$'
end-set
!
as-path-set 99
  ios-regex '_16509$',
  ios-regex '^(2914_)+(703_)+$'
end-set
commit
end
"
  }
}

item.description: This is applicable for XRv5 only

body.raw:
{
  "input" :
  {
     "ios-cli:command" : "configure
telnet vrf default ipv4 server max-servers 10
lacp system mac 0123.0123.0123
call-home
 service active
 contact smart-licensing
 profile CiscoTAC-1
  active
  destination transport-method http
 !
!
ipv6 access-list D300000000_Ipv6_out
 10 permit udp any any eq 3784
!
ipv4 access-list BFD
 10 permit udp any any eq 3784
!
class-map match-any class_qos_group
 match qos-group 4 60 
 end-class-map
! 
class-map match-any class_qos_group2
 match qos-group 4 50 
 end-class-map
! 
policy-map policy1
 class class_qos_group
  set dscp af31
 ! 
 class class-default
 !        
 end-policy-map
! 
policy-map policy2
 class class_qos_group2
  set dscp af32
 ! 
 class class-default
 ! 
 end-policy-map
! 
interface Bundle-Ether60
!
interface Bundle-Ether60.70
 description desc_test
 vrf THU
 ipv4 address 10.1.2.3 255.255.255.248
 load-interval 30
 encapsulation dot1q 70
 logging events link-status
 carrier-delay up 500
!
interface Bundle-Ether200
 description TB-002XRV-02-aaaaaaa
!
interface Bundle-Ether200.1
 description 200.1
!
interface Bundle-Ether3133
!
exit
!
prefix-set CUST_D300000000_in
end-set
!
prefix-set CUST_D300000000_BH_in
  2400:a140::/32 eq 128
end-set
!
prefix-set CUST_IPv6_D300000000_in
end-set
!
as-path-set 100
  ios-regex '^(23816_)+$',
  ios-regex '^(23816_)'
end-set
!
community-set CUST-LP-40
  no-export
end-set
!
community-set CUST-LP-700
  no-export
end-set
!
community-set DDosS-CUST-BH
  17676:1088
end-set
!
route-policy TESTTEST
  set med 70
  pass
end-policy
!
route-policy ZR-SET-MED
  pass
end-policy
!
route-policy SET-COMMUNITY-THU
  done
end-policy
!
route-policy CUST_D300000001_in
  if as-path length ge 75 then
    drop
  elseif not as-path in 100 then
    set med +50
    set next-hop 2001::
    pass
  elseif community matches-any DDosS-CUST-BH and destination in CUST_D300000000_BH_in then
    set community (17676:2089)
    set next-hop 169.254.255.254
  elseif destination in CUST_D300000000_in then
    set med 100
  elseif community matches-any CUST-LP-40 then
    set local-preference 40
    set community (17676:330) additive
  elseif community matches-any CUST-LP-700 then
    set local-preference 700
    set community (17676:330) additive
  else
    set local-preference 1200
    set community (17676:330) additive
  endif
end-policy
!
route-policy POLICY-PEER-GROUP-IN
  pass
end-policy
!
route-policy ISIS-REDISTRIBUTE-001
  done
end-policy
!
route-policy ISIS-REDISTRIBUTE-002
  done
end-policy
!
route-policy POLICY-PEER-GROUP-OUT
  pass
end-policy
!
route-policy POLICY-PEER-GROUP-IN-UPDATE
  pass
end-policy
!
route-policy POLICY-PEER-GROUP-OUT-UPDATE
  pass
end-policy
!
route-policy policy_CUST_BGP-Default_Originate
  drop
end-policy
!
router isis 200
!
router isis 300
!
router isis 400
 address-family ipv6 unicast
 !
!
router ospf 100
 vrf THU
  max-metric router-lsa include-stub summary-lsa external-lsa
 !
!
router ospf default
!
router ospfv3 default
!
router bgp 20101 instance aaa
 neighbor 2400:2020:40:ff::1
  remote-as 17676
  shutdown
 !
 vrf iups
 !
!
commit
end"
  }
}

body.raw:
{
  "input" :
  {
     "ios-cli:command" : "configure
 ipv4 access-list 190
 10 deny ipv4 any any
!
ipv4 access-list Ingress_Acl
 10 deny ipv4 any any
!
interface Bundle-Ether103
 description cede
!
interface Bundle-Ether103.100
 description TOOL_TEST
 service-policy input REWRITE_TOS2_in
 service-policy output 100M-Policing-BE
 ipv4 address 1.1.1.1 255.255.255.252
 arp timeout 300
 shutdown
 load-interval 30
 ethernet cfm
  mep domain DML3 service 500 mep-id 1
   cos 6
  !
 !
 encapsulation dot1q 100
 ipv4 access-group Ingress_Acl ingress
 ipv4 access-group 190 egress
!
commit
end"
  }
}

body.raw:
{
  "input" :
  {
     "ios-cli:command" : "configure
set chassis fpc 0 lite-mode
set chassis auto-image-upgrade
set protocols ospf overload
set protocols ospf area 192.168.10.1 interface ge-0/0/1.0
set firewall family inet filter management-filter term APTN-VS from source-address 10.10.33.0/24
set firewall family inet filter management-filter term APTN-VS from destination-port 22
set firewall family inet filter management-filter term APTN-VS then accept
commit
exit"
  }
}

{
  "input" :
  {
     "ios-cli:command" : "conf t
     ipv6 access-list Protect-Router-IPV6-CI111-LAN-IN
 permit tcp host 2001:111:111:111::2 host 2001:111:111:111::1 eq bgp sequence 10
   permit tcp host 2001:111:111:111::2 eq bgp host 2001:111:111:111::1 sequence 20
   deny ipv6 any any fragments sequence 30
   permit icmp any FF02::1:FF00:0/104 nd-ns sequence 40
   permit icmp host :: host FF02::1 nd-ns sequence 50
   permit icmp host FF02::1 host FF02::1 nd-ns sequence 60
   permit icmp host FF02::1 host FF02::1 nd-na sequence 70
   permit icmp any any echo-request sequence 80
   permit icmp any any echo-reply sequence 90
   permit icmp any any packet-too-big sequence 100
   permit icmp any any time-exceeded sequence 110
   deny udp any any eq 0 sequence 120
   deny tcp any any eq 0 sequence 130
   deny sctp any any eq 0 sequence 140
   deny ipv6 any host 2001:111:111:111::1 sequence 150
   deny ipv6 any host 2001:11:11:11::3 sequence 160
   permit ipv6 any any sequence 170
     end"
  }
}

{
  "input" :
  {
     "ios-cli:command" :"conf t
router bgp 17676
 address-family ipv6 unicast
  bgp attribute-download
 !
 neighbor 10.64.2.100
  remote-as 17676
  description TB100-007RR-02
  update-source Loopback0
  address-family ipv6 labeled-unicast
  !
 !
!
commit
end
	"}
 }

item.name: mount ASR netconf with same parameters
check if device tried to reconnect

exec: // If the device remains connected, test passes.
// If the ODL tries to reconnect the device, test fails.

item.name: mount ASR netconf with different parameters
check if device tried to reconnect

item.description:
Please when you are going to manually test this collection test it through runner or via newman. The folder Mount System Test need to be run multiple times before Check final Status of nodes.
BUT if you want to do it manually you need to follow this logic:

1. mount R1 ,delete mount R1
2. mount R2 ,delete mount R2
3. wait some time and repeat step 1 and 2
4. if you finish your desired repetition (for test the counter is set up on 4) -> mount R1 and R2 and you can continue from check R1 unified point exist till the end
5. notice that it take some time after you mount your nodes to have available information of nodes

  {
     "ios-cli:command" : "configure
     set chassis fpc 0 lite-mode
     set chassis auto-image-upgrade
     set services rpm
     set interfaces ge-0/0/0 flexible-vlan-tagging
     set interfaces ae2206 flexible-vlan-tagging
     set interfaces fxp0 unit 0 family inet address 10.1.12.45/16
     commit
     exit"
  }
}

body.raw:
{
  "input" :
  {
     "ios-cli:command" : "conf t
hostname xr623
logging trap debugging
logging console disable
logging buffered 10000000
logging buffered debugging
logging facility local5
logging 221.111.4.81 vrf default severity info
logging 221.111.4.82 vrf default severity info
logging 221.111.51.134 vrf default severity info
logging 221.111.51.215 vrf default severity info
logging 221.111.79.127 vrf default severity info
logging 219.188.193.107 vrf default severity info
logging 219.188.193.108 vrf default severity info
logging suppress rule MMAP_PEER_CONNECT
 alarm OS MMAP_PEER CONNECT
!
logging suppress apply rule MMAP_PEER_CONNECT
 all-of-router
!
logging source-interface Loopback0
service timestamps log datetime localtime msec show-timezone year
service timestamps debug datetime localtime msec show-timezone year
domain lookup disable
telnet vrf Mgmt-intf ipv4 server max-servers 20
cinetd rate-limit 20
radius source-interface Loopback0 vrf default
radius-server host 219.188.193.56 auth-port 1812 acct-port 1813
 key 7 06070831415C071F00181A0F0E0D253E23
!
hostname xr623
username cisco
 group root-lr
 group cisco-support
 secret 5 $1$claD$2AZTrU4EIBlUg6yMUHBc7/
!
call-home
 service active
 contact smart-licensing
 profile CiscoTAC-1
  active
  destination transport-method http
 !
!
vrf iups
!
snmp-server ifindex persist
snmp-server ifmib stats cache
snmp-server host 221.111.51.93 traps grugru
snmp-server host 221.111.51.106 traps grugru
snmp-server host 221.111.51.222 traps grugru
snmp-server host 221.111.79.85 traps grugru
snmp-server community grugru RO IPv4 61
snmp-server community public RO
snmp-server traps rf
snmp-server traps bfd
snmp-server traps ntp
snmp-server traps snmp
snmp-server traps snmp linkup
snmp-server traps snmp linkdown
snmp-server traps snmp coldstart
snmp-server traps snmp warmstart
snmp-server traps flash removal
snmp-server traps flash insertion
snmp-server traps entity
snmp-server traps system
snmp-server trap-source Loopback0
ipv4 conflict-policy static
ipv6 conflict-policy static
ntp
 server 219.188.200.128
 access-group ipv4 peer 68
 access-group ipv6 peer 68
 source Loopback0
 update-calendar
!
bfd
 bundle coexistence bob-blb logical
!
configuration display interface slot-order
call-home
 service active
 contact smart-licensing
 profile CiscoTAC-1
  active
  destination transport-method http
 !
!
control-plane
 management-plane
  inband
   interface all
    allow all
   !
  !
 !
!
exception choice 1 filepath harddisk:
ipv4 virtual address 10.222.182.150/24
ipv6 access-list 65
 10 deny ipv6 any any
!
ipv6 access-list 68
 10 permit ipv6 host 2400:2020:40:fff::1 any
 20 permit ipv6 host 2400:2020:40:fff::2 any
!
ipv4 access-list 190
 10 deny ipv4 10.0.0.0/8 any
!
ipv4 access-list BFD
 10 permit udp any any eq 3784
!
ipv4 access-list Ingress_Acl
 10 permit ipv4 any any
!
interface Bundle-Ether100
!
interface Bundle-Ether100.150
 description D3000000001
 ipv4 address 1.1.1.1 255.255.255.252
 arp timeout 300
 load-interval 30
 encapsulation dot1q 150
!
interface Bundle-Ether1234
!
interface Bundle-Ether1234.3504
 description TEST_OD
 service-policy input REWRITE_TOS2_in
 service-policy output 100M_PolicyName
 ipv4 address 192.168.10.10 255.255.255.252
 arp timeout 300
 load-interval 30
 encapsulation dot1q 3504
 ipv4 access-group Ingress_Acl ingress
 ipv4 access-group 190 egress
!
interface Bundle-Ether1311
!
interface Bundle-Ether3133
 service-policy input POL_INGRESS
 service-policy output POL_EGRESS
!
interface Bundle-Ether3133.1
 encapsulation dot1q 100
 ipv4 access-group Ingress_Acl ingress
 ipv4 access-group BFD egress
!
interface Bundle-Ether3133.150
 description aaa--001
!
interface Bundle-Ether3133.159
 description D3000000001
 ipv4 address 1.1.1.1 255.255.255.252
 arp timeout 300
 load-interval 30
 encapsulation dot1q 159
!
interface Bundle-Ether3133.160
 description D3000000001
 ipv4 address 1.1.1.1 255.255.255.252
 arp timeout 300
 load-interval 30
 encapsulation dot1q 160
!
interface MgmtEth0/RP0/CPU0/0
 ipv4 address {{xr_ip}} 255.255.255.0
!
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/0/0
 shutdown
!
route-policy POL_EGRESS
  done
end-policy
!
route-policy POL_INGRESS
  done
end-policy
!
router isis 300
 interface Bundle-Ether3133
 !
!
router ospf 100
!
router bgp 17676
 address-family ipv4 unicast
  network 10.1.1.0/30
  network 11.1.1.0/30
  network 100.0.100.0/24
 !
!
netconf-yang agent
 ssh
!
ssh server v2
ssh server rate-limit 180
commit
end"
  }
}
